title: oguprice
author: oguprice
content: The total number of BTC ever to be in existence is capped at 21 million. This scarcity has made it valuable similar to precious metals like gold, silver, diamond etc. also a large number of people are interested in BTC and are also investing in it.It has been seen that people are more confident to invest in BTC than other crypto currency in the world.BTC is also the most generally accepted form of exchange in today's world and it has gain more popularity than any other crypto currency in the world.BTC is the best crypto to buy and be relaxed that it won't drop to the point of you losing your money instead there's hope of it going high thereby increasing your income.BTC is also decentralized no one is totally in control of it and this is the best part of BTC.BTC will forever remain the greatest crypto currency in the world.What are your thoughts do you believe BTC will remain the greatest crypto currency in the world.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Bitcoin is digital gold, and as an asset it has long term durability, the longer the time the more valuable bitcoin becomes just like gold and other precious metals.What makes bitcoin more unique is that, bitcoin is digitally tranfereble but all the other assets in bitcoin asset class are all offline, that is why some segments of bitcoin lover refer to bitcoin as a digital gold.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: It will remain as that and no one would be able to overtake that position for a long time. Imagine, it has been approved with ETFs all around the world and no other crypto has done that yet and that's because it's #1. It will be an asset everyone should have because it's digital gold and I agree. BTC will remain at the top for a very long time.

comments.author: harapan
comments.body: Quote from: Ojima-ojo on April 15, 2024, 11:17:51 PMBitcoin is digital gold, and as an asset it has long term durability, the longer the time the more valuable bitcoin becomes just like gold and other precious metals.What makes bitcoin more unique is that, bitcoin is digitally tranfereble but all the other assets in bitcoin asset class are all offline, that is why some segments of bitcoin lover refer to bitcoin as a digital gold.According to bitcoin speculators bit coin still holds greater chances to remain popular over the next decade and also that Bitcoin,the blockchain,will probably continue to be developed to address long-standing issues like scalability and security.There's no possibility that we can predict what will or what can happen to bitcoin in next 5 to 10 years,as many factors can constitute a rise or fall in price/market.We all worry about this a lot and it still clear that no one has gotten an idea of what the future holds for bitcoin.But its essential that we focus and anticipate for only positive outcomes.

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: I agree with everything you said other than the part where you said BTC is the most generally accepted form of exchange in the world which isn't entirely true. As a form of exchange, Bitcoin is not so widely accepted in the world right now because most countries have not yet shown the green flag to it and you can barely find people or places where Bitcoin is accepted apart from a few countries that are Bitcoin-friendly and allow this thing.The scarcity of Bitcoin is the reason why it's so popular because the demand keeps increasing and since it has a limited supply, it's value goes up every time the demand increases and more people want to have a share of the existing supply of it. This is also why the halving event is considered so important because it reduces the increasing supply of Bitcoin which makes it have a more stagnant circulating supply while the demand keeps increasing.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: oguprice on April 15, 2024, 11:04:25 PMThe total number of BTC ever to be in existence is capped at 21 million. This scarcity has made it valuable similar to precious metals like gold, silver, diamond etc. You can find many altcoins (alternate cryptocurrencies) with same total supplies like Bitcoin, many of them are Bitcoin forks, or smaller than Bitcoin total supply but these cryptocurrencies are either dead or have very low values.Total supply, by this example, is not the main factor to decide value of a cryptocurrency.How many Bitcoin forks are there?

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: It is certain that BTC will remain the greatest cryptocurrency in the world for a long time, although there are some currencies that can surpass Bitcoin in some of its characteristics, but there is no currency that can compete with Bitcoin or obtain the trust and status that Bitcoin has.Bitcoin has all the unique features that make it the greatest currency in the world, but it is not without some flaws that prevent Bitcoin from being used as a unified global currency, but these flaws can be fixed over time when global adoption occurs.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: oguprice on April 15, 2024, 11:04:25 PMWhat are your thoughts do you believe BTC will remain the greatest crypto currency in the world.We can also apply this to real life, whereby we see people going for what they want because such fixed up a particular want or demands from them, Bitcoin has been long awaited for, the people have been silently ignored of their privacy with financial economy using commercial banks, they are tired of the centralized means of handling their finances, this makes them to go further for seeking an alternative in bitcoin and when they discover it's advantages, they couldn't resist it any more than to adopt it for their financial satisfaction, everyone in cryptocurrency today must have first heard about bitcoin in the first place.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: Quote from: oguprice on April 15, 2024, 11:04:25 PMThe total number of BTC ever to be in existence is capped at 21 million. This scarcity has made it valuable similar to precious metals like gold, silver, diamond etc.This is an incomplete statement. Like gold, silver, etc. Bitcoin is not only valuable because of its supply. Instead the capped supply is a contributing factor, the main factor is its utilities. Otherwise a shitcoin like 42coin (supply cap is at 42) and a lot of altcoins have capped supply too but they are useless which means they are never considered for purchase let alone have any increasing value.QuoteIt has been seen that people are more confident to invest in BTC than other crypto currency in the world.People choose bitcoin over others because bitcoin is useful while others aren't.QuoteBTC is the best crypto to buy and be relaxed that it won't drop to the point of you losing your money You need to add a "in the long run" at the end because bitcoin drops in short term a lot.QuoteBTC will forever remain the greatest crypto currency in the world.Forever is a long time. Any new innovation has the potential of competing with Bitcoin and surpassing it. The thing is that in the past 15 years from Bitcoin inception, there hasn't been any significant innovation worthy of attention or capable of competing with Bitcoin.

comments.author: Gaza13
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on April 16, 2024, 02:41:54 AMIt is certain that BTC will remain the greatest cryptocurrency in the world for a long time, although there are some currencies that can surpass Bitcoin in some of its characteristics, but there is no currency that can compete with Bitcoin or obtain the trust and status that Bitcoin has.Bitcoin has all the unique features that make it the greatest currency in the world, but it is not without some flaws that prevent Bitcoin from being used as a unified global currency, but these flaws can be fixed over time when global adoption occurs.Maybe I'm asking you a little "what currency can outperform bitcoin".Maybe you could explain it in more detail?Not only is it unique, in my opinion Bitcoin is an unusual software technology and it is very extraordinary that this asset was created, as far as I know, this asset was created as a means of exchange for transactions in the digital online world. In my view there is no fiat or any other currency in this world that can compete with bitcoin, The creator of BTC saw something strange about the fiat financial system throughout the world. What makes Bitcoin big in the future is that its supply will remain constant forever.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Quote from: oguprice on April 15, 2024, 11:04:25 PMWhat are your thoughts do you believe BTC will remain the greatest crypto currency in the world.To add what you said, Bitcoin is the only one privacy oriented coin that allowed by most countries, while other privacy coins already being delisted or banned from many centralized sites/countries.Quote from: Gaza13 on April 16, 2024, 08:07:08 AMMaybe I'm asking you a little "what currency can outperform bitcoin".Maybe you could explain it in more detail?Outperform in terms of anonymity = Monero.Outperform in terms of price = any low volume shitcoins that worth $0.000001 and then suddenly reach to $0.001.Outperform in terms combination of security, decentralized, safety, privacy, high return etc etc = none.

comments.author: BALIK
comments.body: Quote from: BlackBoss_ on April 16, 2024, 02:11:53 AMQuote from: oguprice on April 15, 2024, 11:04:25 PMThe total number of BTC ever to be in existence is capped at 21 million. This scarcity has made it valuable similar to precious metals like gold, silver, diamond etc. You can find many altcoins (alternate cryptocurrencies) with same total supplies like Bitcoin, many of them are Bitcoin forks, or smaller than Bitcoin total supply but these cryptocurrencies are either dead or have very low values.Total supply, by this example, is not the main factor to decide value of a cryptocurrency.How many Bitcoin forks are there?Limited supply may be an advantage bitcoin has over fiat currencies, but it is not the only factor that makes bitcoin superior and special. You're right, creating a coin with a finite supply has never been too difficult, many altcoins also have this feature but it's confusing that many people always consider it the pride of bitcoin. In my opinion, the difference and most outstanding point of bitcoin is decentralization and so far no currency has achieved the level of decentralization like bitcoin. Additionally, an asset with a finite supply is useless if it has no use case. Bitcoin has many factors that set it apart from the rest of the world, not just its limited supply.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: oguprice on April 15, 2024, 11:04:25 PMThe total number of BTC ever to be in existence is capped at 21 million. This scarcity has made it valuable similar to precious metals like gold, silver, diamond etc. also a large number of people are interested in BTC and are also investing in it.A fixed supply doesn't translate to scarcity. Bitcoin is divisible so you will be able to get some when you want, but there can only be so much that will ever be available in circulation. Precious metals do not have a fixed supply.Bitcoin's value is also derived from many features it possesses, a capped supply is just one of them.Quote from: oguprice on April 15, 2024, 11:04:25 PMBTC is the best crypto to buy and be relaxed that it won't drop to the point of you losing your money instead there's hope of it going high thereby increasing your income.If you buy at a high price it can drop below that amount, but remember that you do not lose unless you sell.Quote from: oguprice on April 15, 2024, 11:04:25 PMBTC will forever remain the greatest crypto currency in the world.Innovation is a constant in today's world.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Quote from: oguprice on April 15, 2024, 11:04:25 PM-snip-What are your thoughts do you believe BTC will remain the greatest crypto currency in the world.Your points are not without faults and I would have loved it if you numbered them just as you listed them.First, I often read people mentioning the maximum 21 million BTC supply, but they often see the positive side due to the lesser supply it may cause with the higher demand it could cause. However, they neglect the limitations it can cause for the progress of Bitcoin. No wonder some crypto projects avoided that limitation and even made their projects more scalable than Bitcoin. All these are pros even if we are finding some excuses to prove that Bitcoin is better. And of course, it's uncontroversial that Bitcoin is the number one cryptocurrency in the world. It prepared the table for other cryptocurrencies and is the pioneer, what do you expect? It is already inculcated into the mainstream of the financial market and I expect it to take the front roll and role for as long as possible.However, I hope the government will not someday clamp down on it, I don't trust them. This will be severe on the private and corporate users due to its decentralisation. Bitcoin is a true decentralised cryptocurrency, it has always been the headache of the government and they've never hidden their grievance about that. If that is left out of it, Bitcoin is the biggest name in the crypto space and will remain like that as long as cryptocurrency exists.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: oguprice on April 15, 2024, 11:04:25 PMBTC is the best crypto to buy and be relaxed that it won't drop to the point of you losing your money instead there's hope of it going high thereby increasing your income.This is near on how my friends asked me about Bitcoin. While I told them that volatility can hit everyone badly that our portfolios or even bitcoin alone can drop in value because of having a paper loss but, it's not going to zero or near that.That's what I have assured them that their money invested on Bitcoin could drop with its value but it's far from being nothing.Quote from: oguprice on April 15, 2024, 11:04:25 PMWhat are your thoughts do you believe BTC will remain the greatest crypto currency in the world.I do.

comments.author: kro55
comments.body: Quote from: Gaza13 on April 16, 2024, 08:07:08 AMQuote from: yhiaali3 on April 16, 2024, 02:41:54 AMIt is certain that BTC will remain the greatest cryptocurrency in the world for a long time, although there are some currencies that can surpass Bitcoin in some of its characteristics, but there is no currency that can compete with Bitcoin or obtain the trust and status that Bitcoin has.Bitcoin has all the unique features that make it the greatest currency in the world, but it is not without some flaws that prevent Bitcoin from being used as a unified global currency, but these flaws can be fixed over time when global adoption occurs.Maybe I'm asking you a little "what currency can outperform bitcoin".Maybe you could explain it in more detail?Not only is it unique, in my opinion Bitcoin is an unusual software technology and it is very extraordinary that this asset was created, as far as I know, this asset was created as a means of exchange for transactions in the digital online world. In my view there is no fiat or any other currency in this world that can compete with bitcoin, The creator of BTC saw something strange about the fiat financial system throughout the world. What makes Bitcoin big in the future is that its supply will remain constant forever.If supply is the main factor that makes bitcoin strong in the future, what about some altcoins with lower supply than bitcoin? Many altcoins not only have a limited supply, developers even burn their supply on a quarterly basis, which will make those altcoins extremely scarce. If your view is that relying on supply alone will make bitcoin strong, does that mean there will be more altcoins stronger than bitcoin? Don't just focus on supply and assume that's all bitcoin has to offer. We need benefits, use cases, security, decentralization...so many factors combine to make bitcoin a leading currency.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: Gaza13 on April 16, 2024, 08:07:08 AMMaybe I'm asking you a little "what currency can outperform bitcoin".Maybe you could explain it in more detail?Of course, there are coins that outperform Bitcoin in some characteristics, but not all of them. For example, there are coins that outperform Bitcoin in transaction speed, as they are several times faster than Bitcoin. In addition, there are currencies that outperform Bitcoin in fees, as their fees are very low compared to Bitcoin.This is in small partial details, but in general and in terms of complete characteristics, there cannot be a currency that is superior to Bitcoin in terms of its unique features.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: Quote from: oguprice on April 15, 2024, 11:04:25 PMWhat are your thoughts do you believe BTC will remain the greatest crypto currency in the world.Bitcoin is at the top of its game right now. Do I think that it will stay up there for a long time? Yes, I do.But I don’t think it will be forever up there. There is a chance that a new altcoin prove itself to be much more valuable than bitcoin with a much sophisticated technology and functionality. We can not deny that time is changing and so is everything else.
